name: crush
description: Invoke Crush to perform complex source code tasks. Crush is a powerful coding agent that can create, modify, refactor, debug, and test code across multiple files.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Detailed description of the coding task to accomplish. Be specific about objectives, scope, constraints, and success criteria.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model to use for the task (e.g., 'claude-sonnet-4', 'gpt-4.1'). Pass through from model context.

parameters.name: small_model
parameters.description: Small model to use for auxiliary tasks like generating commit messages.
